title: Road to Paris: Chloe Dygert’s Olympic Campaign Kicks Off in Australia
content:
Ruth Edwards also returns with Human Powered Health, with Biniam Girmay, Caleb Ewan, Elia Viviani, and Filippo Ganna confirmed for the WorldTour opener next month.

Read the full article at Road to Paris: Chloe Dygert’s Olympic Campaign Kicks Off in Australia on Velo.
author: ahood
